memberdef.name: VIGRA_DEFINE_MISSING_ABS
memberdef.initializer: inline T abs(T t) { return t < 0 ? -t : t; }

memberdef.name: VIGRA_DEFINE_NORM
memberdef.initializer: inline NormTraits<T>::SquaredNormType squaredNorm(T t) { return sq(t); } \ inline NormTraits<T>::NormType norm(T t) { return abs(t); }

memberdef.name: VIGRA_DEFINE_ODD_EVEN
memberdef.initializer: inline bool even(T t) { return (t&1) == 0; } \ inline bool odd(T t) { return (t&1) == 1; }

memberdef.name: VIGRA_DEFINE_SCALAR_DOT
memberdef.initializer: inline NumericTraits<T>::Promote dot(T l, T r) { return l*r; }

memberdef.name: VIGRA_DEFINE_UNSIGNED_ABS
memberdef.initializer: inline T abs(T t) { return t; }
